about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: You are driving on a freeway with a posted speed limit of 65 mph. Traffic is traveling at 70 mph. You may legally drive:

hasPart.assesses: You are driving on a freeway with a posted speed limit of 65 mph. Traffic is traveling at 70 mph. You may legally drive: | You are driving on a freeway with a posted speed limit of 65 mph. Traffic is traveling at 70 mph. You may legally drive: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: On most California highways, the maximum speed limit is 65 mph. You may drive at 70 mph only if the speed limit is posted as such.

suggestedAnswer.text: 70 mph or faster to keep up with the speed of traffic.

comment.text: 70 mph or faster to keep up with the speed of traffic.
Between 65 mph and 70 mph.
No faster than 65 mph.
No faster than 65 mph.

answerExplanation.text: On most California highways, the maximum speed limit is 65 mph. You may drive at 70 mph only if the speed limit is posted as such.

hasPart.text: Use your low beam headlights when driving in fog, rain, or snow. High beam lights can reflect off the weather conditions, lowering visibility even more.

comment.text: High beam headlights.
Low beam headlights.
Four-way flashers.
Low beam headlights.

answerExplanation.text: Use your low beam headlights when driving in fog, rain, or snow. High beam lights can reflect off the weather conditions, lowering visibility even more.

hasPart.name: If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, you should: | If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, do not attempt to turn back onto the roadway immediately. Instead, reduce your speed, check traffic, and gradually turn back onto the roadway when it is safe to do so.

suggestedAnswer.text: Wait until it is safe to do so, then gradually re-enter the roadway.

comment.text: Wait until it is safe to do so, then gradually re-enter the roadway.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn back onto the roadway immediately.

comment.text: Turn back onto the roadway immediately.
Stop.

acceptedAnswer.text: Wait until it is safe to do so, then gradually re-enter the roadway.

comment.text: Wait until it is safe to do so, then gradually re-enter the roadway.

answerExplanation.text: If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, do not attempt to turn back onto the roadway immediately. Instead, reduce your speed, check traffic, and gradually turn back onto the roadway when it is safe to do so.

comment.text: If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, you should: | If your wheels drop off the roadway or pavement edge, do not attempt to turn back onto the roadway immediately. hasPart.text: When entering a roundabout, you must yield to pedestrians, bicyclists, and traffic already in the roundabout.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to any crossing pedestrians and bicyclists.

comment.text: Yield to any crossing pedestrians and bicyclists.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to any car already within the roundabout.

comment.text: Yield to any car already within the roundabout.
Both of the above.
Both of the above.

hasPart.text: Driving during the first half hour of rainfall is dangerous because roadways become extremely slippery when the water mixes with oil and other chemicals on the road surfaces that have not yet washed away. Use extra caution when driving on slippery roads.

suggestedAnswer.text: When it has been raining hard for several hours.

comment.text: When it has been raining hard for several hours.

suggestedAnswer.text: When they are clean and dry.

comment.text: When they are clean and dry.

suggestedAnswer.text: Just after it starts to rain.

comment.text: Just after it starts to rain.

acceptedAnswer.text: Just after it starts to rain.

comment.text: Just after it starts to rain.

answerExplanation.text: Driving during the first half hour of rainfall is dangerous because roadways become extremely slippery when the water mixes with oil and other chemicals on the road surfaces that have not yet washed away. Use extra caution when driving on slippery roads.

hasPart.name: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should:

about.name: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should: | If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you injure or kill an animal on the roadway, you should call CHP, the nearest humane society, or the police. You should not leave the animal to die or try to move the animal.

suggestedAnswer.text: Move the injured animal off the road.

comment.text: Move the injured animal off the road.
Call the humane society.
Continue driving.
Call the humane society.

answerExplanation.text: If you injure or kill an animal on the roadway, you should call CHP, the nearest humane society, or the police. You should not leave the animal to die or try to move the animal.
